title: abhimAnam ennaDu galgurAma
sahitya:
abhimAnamennaDu galgu rAma amarEndra vandita pAda nApai

anupallavi

ibharAja varada nApai nIkinta kOpamElanayya nIvADanE

caraNam

anni vastramulakEmi dOvayani ennaDaina ninnaDiginAnA
 kanna tanDri nIvEyani anmmi nI karuNa galgitE cAluniyuNDaga
 ninnagAnu nIvu viDanADa jUcitE nannu brOcEvArevarayya
 vennuDaina shrI venkatEsha nAdu vinnapambu vinarAdA nAtO vAdA
